entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Rodney
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:34 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 10.3°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 this morning. High 15. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 1.
